OOAdobeAnalyticsManager Class Reference

Detailed Description

Class integrated with Adobe Heartbeat Analytics.

You'll use this to initiate Adobe analytics tracking with the Ooyala Player.

Method Documentation

- (nullable instancetype) initWithPlayer: (nonnull OOOoyalaPlayer *)  player
config: (nonnull OOAdobeHeartbeatConfiguration *)  NS_DESIGNATED_INITIALIZER 

Designated initializer that expects an OoyalaPlayer.

It will prepare Adobe Analytics with this player.

Parameters
[in]playerThe player that will be used to retrieve info from.
[in]configConfiguration used to initialize analytics.
- (void) startCapture

Starts tracking the player events.

Also known as starting a video session.

- (void) stopCapture

Stops tracking of the player events.

It's important to call this to end a video session.
